definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

sentences.english: Concertos are generally in three movements.
sentences.chinese: 协奏曲是另外一种类型。

sentences.english: I heard Oistrakh play the Mendelssohn concerto last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我听了奥斯崔克演奏的孟德尔逊协奏曲。

sentences.english: Castelnuovo-Tedesco also composed for them a Concerto for Two Guitars.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯特罗夫还为他们写了一首双吉他协奏曲。

sentences.english: Reduction of Piano Concerto No. 2, for two pianos.
sentences.chinese: 为双钢琴而作的第2钢琴协奏曲缩编谱。

sentences.english: This recording of the Mozart violin concertos is quite simply the best available.
sentences.chinese: 这是莫扎特的小提琴协奏曲录制简直可以说是最好的。

sentences.english: Reduction of Violin Concerto No. 1, for violin and piano.
sentences.chinese: 为小提琴和钢琴而作的第1小提琴协奏曲缩编谱。

sentences.english: The concerto is a composition for one or more soloists and orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 协奏曲是一个或多个领奏者和管弦乐队合作的作品。

sentences.english: Piano Concerto No. 4 in G major, Op.
sentences.chinese: 钢琴协奏曲第4号在G大，作品。

sentences.english: It was in this room that Chopin gave the first performances of this concerto.
sentences.chinese: 就是在这个房间里，肖邦首次演奏该协奏曲。

sentences.english: The pianist's execution of the concerto was marvellous.
sentences.chinese: 那钢琴师弹的协奏曲神乎其技。

sentences.english: Violin Concerto in F minor, Op. 8 No. 4 L'Inverno(Winter)
sentences.chinese: 小提琴协奏曲《冬》，F小调，作品8号之四。

sentences.english: It is Allegro from Concerto Number One " Spring" from the " Four Seasons" .
sentences.chinese: 它来自协奏曲一号《四季》里面的春。

sentences.english: I heard him practising Chopin's first ballade.
sentences.chinese: 我听到过他练习肖邦第一协奏曲。

sentences.english: Reduction of Piano Concerto No. 1, for two pianos.
sentences.chinese: 为双钢琴而作的第1钢琴协奏曲缩编谱。

sentences.english: I like listening to some concertos, at the same time is holding the fine ceramics small teapot warm hand.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢听一些协奏曲，一面捧着细瓷的小茶壶暖手。

sentences.english: Schuman was known for his piano concerto.
sentences.chinese: 舒曼以他的钢琴协奏曲而著名。

definition: musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
to perform on a musical instrument
